title: Bai Xiang Zheme Duo
synopsis: The first domestic micro-animation featuring the turning point of God. The network has distinctive characteristics. Each episode is about three minutes long and consists of independent short stories between the protagonist Xiaobai and different characters. This is a micro-animation of the most two gods in history! Love, family affection, good friends, heavy tastes, a spoof hilarious style rooted in the Internet, perfectly combined with fast-paced animation, open minded, emphasize content and not constrained to form, audiences can experience it in every episode The pleasure brought by the fast pace and the turning of God! (translated from bilibili)
